rows.label: qst000801_msg0001
rows.name:
It's snapped in two... I guess they used
it to try and open this chest, but failed?

rows.label: qst000801_msg0002
rows.name: Wait, there's something written on it...

rows.label: qst000801_msg0101
rows.name:
Huh, it's broken. Looks like someone
used it to try and prize open the
chest. Unsuccessfully.

rows.label: qst000801_msg0102
rows.name: There are some markings on the hilt...

rows.label: qst000801_msg0201
rows.name:
It's snapped clean in two. Looks like
some rascal tried to open the chest
with it. Didn't get very far, though...

rows.label: qst000801_msg0202
rows.name:
Hello? There's something written
on it.

rows.label: qst000801_msg0301
rows.name:
Knife is all broken in half!
Maybe someone try to open chest
with knife, but it not work?

rows.label: qst000801_msg0302
rows.name: Meh-meh? It have words on holdy bit!

rows.label: qst000801_msg0401
rows.name:
The blade seems to be broken.
Someone must have tried to open the
chest, but clearly to no avail.

rows.label: qst000801_msg0402
rows.name: Hmm? There are words on the hilt...

rows.label: qst000801_msg0501
rows.name:
"Wealth and fortune to Erebos, dearest
grandson."

rows.label: qst000801_msg0502
rows.name:
Looks important. If we ever come
across the owner, we'll have to ask
them about it.

rows.label: qst000801_msg0503
rows.name:
Looks important. If we ever come
across the owner, we'll have to ask
them about it.

rows.label: qst000801_msg0504
rows.name:
A treasured item, eh? If we ever come
across the owner, I'm sure they'll have
a story to tell about it.

rows.label: qst000801_msg0505
rows.name:
Erebos must have forgotten!
Tora deliver knife for Erebos!

rows.label: qst000801_msg0506
rows.name:
We had better ask its owner about it,
if the opportunity ever presents itself.
